name: A Song of Hex and Jynx - #4 A Witch Shall Not Lie To Herself
description:
It’s not easy to be a witch. Nobody could know your real identity, as not many was willing to accept who you are. But as a living being, there were needs that needed to be met and desires to be fulfilled . Yara, one of the witch, was the type of witch who knew what she wanted and would get it no matter what. Her craving for caressed, pampered, and loved even for one night, overcame the tragic memory that happened to one of her sister not long before. She still remembered her mother’s last words to never bow to any man, so from time to time, she would sleep with a man and erased his memory before she left when the morning came.
.
One night, something felt different with a townsfolk she met at a town where the witches stayed the night. She told her stories and everything to him, knowing he wouldn’t remember anything in the morning, yet the man accepted her without any judge. The young man made her feel at ease, like he relieved all the things that wedged her. She pondered to the thought of not erasing his mind and actually get to know him more. But as the morning came, her cautious self reminded her of the reality she lived in. So she got up, casted the incantation to the man, and with one last look to his pretty face, she left.
